name: XWUI Field Component
description: Form field wrapper component that provides label, input, error message, and hint text in a consistent structure. Supports required and disabled states, various sizes, and validation error display. Uses XWUILabel internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the field

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

hint.description: Hint/help text to display below the input

input.description: Input element or HTML string for the field
